```{r, eval=FALSE}
files <- c("default-fonts", "default-page", "default")
from <- pagedown:::pkg_resource(paste0("css/", files, ".css"))
to <- c("custom-fonts.css", "custom-page.css", "custom.css")
file.copy(from = from, to = to)
```
